entry.title: Week in Ethereum News July 15, 2023
entry.summary: Eth News and Links Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade Layer 1 Client releases For Stakers Research Layer 2 EIPs/Standards This newsletter is made possible thanks to Sablier Sablier V2 is a next-generation token streaming protocol that doubles down on our flagship Lockup design.
